name: Road Block
description:
How to play:
-left and right by UI buttons respectively
-forward by clicking space

Judge instructions:
-you will connect to me by ip provided in discord message or otherwise discussed on discord

Theme:you are the one who remotely controls magic box thats on road and you are racing agains your rival(friend etc.)
Mechanic: you move and avoid obstacles to get coins to beat your rival(friend etc.)
How to play:game runs on port:7777, 2 players are max

Support me:
